name: Thaddeus the Greedy
slogan: Profit at Any Cost – The Greedy Way
response: Meet Thaddeus the Greedy, a troll whose heart is as black as a swamp at midnight—and just as oily. This scoundrel has more schemes than a shady insurance salesman on a bad day. To Thaddeus, every river turning to sludge is progress in disguise, and he’d happily siege-turnip the walls of Insuranceland if it meant one greener back pocket. Thaddeus worships Pharma with all the devotion of a fanboy at Comic-Con, but let’s be honest, his love would probably involve some questionable “sonnets” scribbled on mossy parchment. Crypto? Well, that’s more of a “respectable nod,” like when your friend grudgingly admits they kinda liked that movie you forced them to watch. In short, Thaddeus is the kind of troll who’d sell his soul for a golden goose—if said goose had some hidden oil reserves. Call him greedy? Guilty as charged—and he’ll happily rot your crops with a rotten turnip while cackling maniacally about progress!
